participant_1.background:
I have to use social media for work, but it's not a big part of my life.
i am fairly conservative in politics.
I started a blog to share my love of romance novels with others.
i have never traveled out of the country.
My students are my favorite people because they make me laugh and smile every day.

participant_2.background:
I'm a bit out of touch with my family because of my job, but I'm trying to get better at it.
i am colour blind.
I am still trying to lose weight.
my favorite animal is the panda.
i am an angry person.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hello! I'm doing well. How are you?
I'm doing good too. Thanks for asking!
I love to read romance novels. I also started a blog to share my love of romance novels with others.
That sounds really fun! I'm not much of a reader, but I do enjoy watching movies and TV shows.
Oh, what kind of movies and TV shows do you like?
I like romantic comedies, action movies, and comedies.
I love romantic comedies too! I don't watch too many action movies, but I do like comedies.
Me too! We should watch a movie together sometime.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I would love to do that.
Great! We can exchange numbers and make plans.
Sounds great! I look forward to it
